The idea behind "Micro Frontends" is to think about a website or web app as a composition of features which are owned by independent teams. #microfrontends #microservices #ott #media #cms #axinommosaic https://t.co/75Ho3zx7QV

Micro-frontends are not a silver bullet. They are not going to solve all the problems of the frontend world. It is just an approach that in certain contexts, and applied in a certain way, could make a lot of sense: https://t.co/QSXv3NMX91
